title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Magic Johnson's comments about LeBron James getting in the way of a trade that would have landed the Lakers DeMar DeRozan and why James is in a standoff with LA's front office. He congratulates Kansas on winning the college basketball national championship over North Carolina but explains why they don't stack up against some of the all time great college hoops teams that didn't win a title. He ranks his top 10 teams in the NFL after the top free agent signings of the offseason. Plus, NBA insider Mark Medina joins the show in studio to give insight on why the Lakers have had such a disappointing season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
